articles.title: Somalia Warns Worsening Drought Could Mirror Deadly 2017 Crisis
articles.summary: Mogadishu ‚Äî Somalia's national disaster agency has warned that a deepening drought across the country could escalate sharply after expected seasonal rains failed to materialise, forcing families to flee hard-hit rural areas in search of water and food.
